question: On the DeepFruits fruit detection graph on Connected Papers from 2016, what feature caused the largest bubble to be the size it is?

3. Connected Papers: A visual tool that helps speed up your literature ...
   URL: https://blog-sc.hku.hk/connected-papers-a-visual-tool-that-helps-speed-up-your-literature-search/

trajectory.actor_reasoning:
Connected Papers encodes node size by how frequently a paper is cited; the largest bubble is large because it has the highest citation count among nodes in that graph.

FINAL ANSWER: citation count
